body: Hi Tim, I'd like to show you the error with an easy example. A simple mesh box with only six faces. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/mAhJbRiQDqEjfY0YqYaldL1hukzI7cUddpIaBRyUqtGcSOJYiyz*2fREDibr8c9Qun-MXQCivWzbdGBZJ4nArHTSf2Rdfrvj/Canvas_29112015.png) The lenght of the analysis results list equals the number of mesh faces. Check your values list. Bests, Antonello
